s0297: Sixteenth year, Jin Ping Gong ascended position.
s0298: Twenty-first year, court Jin Ping Gong.
s0300: Twenty-fifth year, Qi Cui Zhu assassinated their lord Zhuang Gong, established his younger brother Jing Gong.
s0301: Twenty-ninth year, Wu Yan Ling Ji Zi sent to Lu, asked Zhou music, completely knew its meaning, Lu people respected him.
s0302: Thirty-first year sixth month, Xiang Gong died.
s0303: Its ninth month, crown prince died.
s0304: Lu people established Qi returned son Chou as lord, this was Zhao Gong.
s0305: Zhao Gong year nineteen, still had child heart.
s0306: Mu Shu not wished establish, said: 'Crown prince died, has mother younger brother can establish, not immediately establish eldest.
s0307: Years equal choose worthy, righteousness equal then divine it.
s0308: Now Chou not proper heir, moreover in mourning intention not in sorrow has happy color, if indeed establish, must be Ji Shi worry.'
s0309: Ji Wu Zi not listened, finally established him.
s0310: When reached burial, three changed mourning clothes.
s0313: Zhao Gong third year, court Jin to Yellow River, Jin Ping Gong apologized returned him, Lu shamed it.
s0314: Fourth year, Chu Ling Wang assembled feudal lords at Shen, Zhao Gong claimed illness not went.
s0315: Seventh year, Ji Wu Zi died.
s0316: Eighth year, Chu Ling Wang completed Zhang Hua Tai, summoned Zhao Gong.
s0317: Zhao Gong went congratulated, granted Zhao Gong treasure vessels;
s0318: afterward regretted, again cheated took them.
s0319: Twelfth year, court Jin to Yellow River, Jin Ping Gong apologized returned him.
s0320: Thirteenth year, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated their lord Ling Wang, replaced established.
s0321: Fifteenth year, court Jin, Jin detained him bury Jin Zhao Gong, Lu shamed it.
s0322: Twentieth year, Qi Jing Gong with Yan Zi hunted border, because entered Lu asked rites.
s0323: Twenty-first year, court Jin to Yellow River, Jin apologized returned him.
s0324: Twenty-fifth year spring, qu yu came nest.
s0325: Shi Ji said: 'Wen Cheng time children's rhyme said 'qu yu come nest, duke at Qian Hou.
s0326: qu yu enter residence, duke outside fields'.'
s0328: Ji Shi with Hou Shi fought cocks, Ji Shi mustard chicken feathers, Hou Shi gold spurs.
s0329: Ji Ping Zi angered invaded Hou Shi, Hou Zhao Bo also angered Ping Zi.
s0330: Zang Zhao Bo's younger brother Hui falsely slandered Zang Shi, hid Ji Shi, Zang Zhao Bo imprisoned Ji Shi people.
s0331: Ji Ping Zi angered, imprisoned Zang Shi elders.
s0332: Zang, Hou Shi with difficulty informed Zhao Gong.
s0333: Zhao Gong ninth month Wu Xu attacked Ji Shi, then entered.
s0334: Ping Zi ascended tower requested said: 'Lord with slander not examine minister crime, execute him, request move Yi Shang.'
s0336: Requested imprison at Meng, not permitted.
s0337: Requested with five chariots flee, not permitted.
s0338: Zi Jia Ju said: 'Lord his permit it.
s0339: Government from Ji Shi long, followers numerous, multitudes will unite plot.'
s0342: Shu Sun Shi's minister Li told his multitudes said: 'No Ji Shi with have, which beneficial?'
s0343: All said: 'No Ji Shi is no Shu Sun Shi.'
